TopicTitle: Hello World of small Green people! - Super newb here!

Articles.Content: Im brand new to the forums.  I bought this game a couple weeks ago and its AWESOME.  Kind of irritating when it crashes, but from what ive read.... such is life.  Good to see everyone.
I'm old to the forums. I bought this game four years ago and its AWESOME. Extremely irritating when it crashes, but from what ive read... such is life. Good to see another new member.
Welcome! I've been on the forums for 14 months but have had the game for 3 years. Have you been to the Mun yet?
Welcome to the forum... share a few photos, share your successes and flaming failures. Stay around a while and make some great KSP forum friends...
Welcome to the community and a great game!

Small ? 

Welcome :-)

Yeah, it crashes. Yeah, life can be irritating. My last off world-lander slided down the hill into the shades and died of empty batteries. That was 2 months ago. Waiting for a new release, new life, new irritations possibilities.
